name: \u3010Project Phoenix\u3011 Japan's indie RPG feat. AAA talent!
blurb: Project Phoenix is a JRPG with a squad based RTS game design, brought to you by veteran developers and creators from the East and West.

rewards.reward: No Reward

SUPPORTER\r\n==============================\r\nThank you for your support!  You have our deepest gratitude and we'll work even harder to deliver the best game possible.  We invite you to join the Project Phoenix Forums, where you will be identified as a Kickstarter Supporter, and able discuss the game with the community.

PIONEER
============================== 
Includes a digital download of the game, and closed BETA Access.
==============================  Includes Supporter Level Rewards

EARLY BIRD
==============================
Be the first to experience the game with access to the Early Bird ALPHA!
============================== 
Includes Pioneer Level Rewards

FOUNDER
==============================
Only available during Kickstarter.  Includes a Kickstarter exclusive in-game cape that will identify you as a Founder of Project Phoenix, as well as access to developer art and content in the Founder's area on the forums.
============================== 
Includes Early Bird Level Rewards

DIGITAL COLLECTOR\r\n==============================\r\nReceive downloadable copies of the following: the making-of Project Phoenix documentary, Project Phoenix soundtrack (featuring music by NOBUO UEMATSU), and the art book.  ============================== Includes Founder Level Rewards

FIERY COMPANION
==============================
Receive a Kickstarter exclusive in-game Phoenix Egg!  Once hatched, the Phoenix Hatchling will follow you throughout your adventures in Azuregard.
============================== Includes Digital Collector Level Rewards

ADVENTURE FOR TWO\r\n==============================\r\nReceive an additional downloadable copy of the game! A great way to bring in a friend to join you on your quest! ============================== Includes Fiery Companion Level Rewards

FIERY STEED ==============================\r\nAfter completing the game, you gain the ability to use your Phoenix as a mount!\r\n============================== Includes Adventure For Two Level Rewards

TREASURE HUNTER
==============================
We'll ship you a physical Collector's Edition of the game all the way from Japan! This includes DVD versions of the game along with the helpful game guide,a making-of Project Phoenix DVD, a detailed cloth map, a Soundtrack DVD that includes special liner notes from legendary composer Nobuo Uematsu!  Also included is a code to redeem your Kickstarter exclusive in-game Phoenix Wings for your character. 
============================== Includes Adventure For Two Level Rewards

TREASURE HUNTER
==============================
We'll ship you a physical Collector's Edition of the game all the way from Japan! This includes DVD versions of the game along with the helpful game guide, a making-of Project Phoenix DVD, a detailed cloth map, a Soundtrack DVD that includes special liner notes from legendary composer Nobuo Uematsu!  Also included is a code to redeem your Kickstarter exclusive in-game Phoenix Wings for your character.
==============================
As a new addition to this, we will also be including a code to redeem the Phoenix Egg, Mount, Cape, and Wings on the PS4 & PS Vita.
==============================
Includes Adventure For Two Level Rewards

ARTISAN\r\n==============================\r\nPhysical copy of the limited edition art book, features all art in game, including early concept art ============================== Includes Treasure Hunter Rewards

ARTISAN II ============================== Physical copy of the limited edition art book, features all art in game, including early concept art ============================== Includes Treasure Hunter Rewards

COMPOSER
==============================
A bound physical copy of the musical score for the game's main theme (printed in A4), composed by Nobuo Uematsu.  Kickstarter exclusive in-game musical items for each playable character; using these items during gameplay will trigger a special effect.
 ============================== Includes Artisan Level Rewards

COMPOSER II ==============================            A bound physical copy of the musical score for the game's main theme (printed in A4), composed by Nobuo Uematsu. Kickstarter exclusive in-game musical items for each playable character; using these items during gameplay will trigger a special effect. ============================== Includes Artisan Level Rewards

DEVELOPER ============================== \r\nGain access to private Developer Discussions/Forums, access to the most current developer build (build access will begin May 2014), and assist our team on game development choices .  As an optional reward, at launch, all areas of game may be unlocked.  You will receive a steel Developer's card, and your name will be listed as a Developer in the game's credits. Your Collector's Edition box will be signed by all the key Developers of Project Phoenix!\r\n============================== Includes Composer Level Rewards

CITIZEN
==============================
You will help the Developers create a prominent NPC, receive a framed 3D model reference sheet, drawn and signed by Asami Hagiwara with a short background on the character by Yoko Enoki.

In addition, your NPC's face, hair style and clothing will be available in character creation to other players.
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards

PUPPETEER
============================== 
Get your own limited edition Sylrianah figurine!  We will ship you this 1/8 scale model of the Princess secured in separate packaging from your Collector's Edition box.  See Good Smile Company Update for details on this Limited Edition figurine.
==============================
Includes Citizen Level Rewards and is included in the Manager rewards and higher

MANAGER
==============================
You will help the Developers create a NPC that will be in charge of a Bar/Inn in one of the smaller towns, and you will assist Developers in the creation of your Bar/Inn.  You will also receive framed A4-size art of your NPC inside of their Bar/Inn, drawn and signed by Asami Hagiwara with a short background on the character by Yoko Enoki. In addition, your NPC's face, hair style and clothing will be available in character creation to other players. 
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards

ENTREPRENEUR
==============================
You will help the Developers create a NPC and an Assistant NPC that will be in charge of a Bar/Inn in one of the larger towns, and you will assist Developers in the creation of your Bar/Inn.  You will also receive framed A4-size art of your NPC and Assistant inside of their Bar/Inn, drawn and signed by Asami Hagiwara with a short background on the character by Yoko Enoki. In addition, your NPC and Assistant's face, hair style and clothing will be available in character creation to other players.  On top of that you can provide a description of your NPC to Nobuo Uematsu, and he will compose your Bar/Inn's music just for you!
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards

PHOENIX - PC
==============================
Our artists will assist you in designing an optional Playable Character in the game! Includes a 3D Printed Model of a game character of your choosing, 3D model reference sheet, framed concept art of character with background; all signed on your request.  On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the developers at the studio, have dinner with the developers, receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party, and get exclusive VIP access to all of the conventions and events for the game! (Transportation and accommodations not included)
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards

PHOENIX - NPC
==============================
Our artists will assist you in designing one of the game's major Non-Playable Characters!  Includes a 3D Printed Model of a game character of your choosing, 3D model reference sheet, framed concept art of character with background; all signed on your request.  On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the developers at the studio, have dinner with the developers, receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party, and get exclusive VIP access to all of the conventions and events for the game! (Transportation and accommodations not included)
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards

PHOENIX - BOSS
==============================
Our artists will assist you in designing one of the game's hidden bosses!  Includes a 3D Printed Model of a game character of your choosing, 3D model reference sheet, framed concept art of character with background; all signed on your request.  On top of that, you'll get to sit in with the developers at the studio, have dinner with the developers, receive an invitation to the internal developer launch party, and get exclusive VIP access to all of the conventions and events for the game! (Transportation and accommodations not included)
============================== Includes Developer Level Rewards
